sentences.sContent: Interest rates could fall soon and be a stimulus to the U.S. economy.
sentences.sCn: 利率可能很快会下降，从而刺激美国经济。

synos.tran: 刺激；剌激物；促进因素（stimulus的复数）

remMethod.val: stimulus(n. 刺激； 刺激物)的复数

trans.tranCn: 刺激；刺激物；促进因素（stimulus的复数）
trans.tranOther: A stimulus is something that encourages activity in people or things
